name: Ancient Wonders: Gardens of Babylon
description:
The construction of a marvelous garden is about to start! King Nebuchadnezzar II wants to build a hanging garden for his wife Queen Amytis! Play through more than 100 levels and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Garden of Babylon!

Play through more than 100 levels in hex-match link style and earn enough gold to fully decorate the Gardens of Babylon!

Key Game Features

More than 100 hex-match-3 link style!
Variety of puzzles such as collapse, jigsaw and spot the difference!
Decorate the Gardens of Babylon!
Game Modes to choose from!
